title: About
preamble: I am a dedicated and enthusiastic software developer located in London, ON currently charting my path in the tech world as a student in the Computer Programmer Analyst program at Fanshawe College.

content.heading: Goals
content.text:
My ultimate goal is establish myself as a full stack developer. I am actively seeking opportunities that will enable me to apply my knowledge in a real-world setting and contribute to meaningful projects.
Through internships and entry-level positions, I am eager to learn from experienced professionals and contribute meaningfully to innovative projects.

content.heading: Skills
content.text: I am proficient in applying the following key skills:
skills: Quickly learning and applying new technologies and methodologies
Efficiently managing time, prioritizing tasks, and meeting deadlines
Applying critical thinking skills to evaluate situations and make informed decisions
Being self-motivated and taking initiative for personal and professional growth
Remaining committed to continuously learning and staying updated with industry trends
Adapting to changing project requirements and embracing new methodologies

content.heading: Technologies
content.text: My technical background spans a diverse range of programming languages, frameworks, and tools. I am proficient in the following technologies:

content.heading: Education
content.text:
My academic journey is rooted in the arts where I earned a Bachelors degree in Music and Philosophy from the University of Western Ontario. My passion for technology and software development led me to pursue a career in the tech industry.
I am currently enrolled in the Computer Programmer Analyst program at Fanshawe College where I am honing my skills in software development and expanding my technical knowledge.
I am currently supplementing my academic studies with online courses to stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies. I have completed or am currently enrolled in the following courses:

courses.title: SQL and PostgreSQL: The Complete Developer's Guide

content.heading: Interests
content.text:
I have a strong enthusiasm for staying ahead of industry trends and emerging technologies.
My passion lies in crafting user-friendly and visually captivating applications. I seamlessly integrate my arts background into problem-solving, relishing the creative process of transforming ideas into functional software.
Beyond software development, my interests extend to cooking, eating, gardening, biking, indulging in professional wrestling, binge-watching King of the Hill, and immersing myself in a diverse range of music.
